data.body:
You are hired as a software engineer for a bank. On your first day on the job, your boss tasks you with creating a Python program that will store information about the customer's credit cards. At an intimidating first meeting, you propose the following solution:

A dev team member is confused about why you passed CreditCard as an argument of the Card class. Which of the following is the correct explanation?

answerChoices.body: To enable the Card class to access attributes from the CreditCard class.
To enable the Card class to access methods from the CreditCard class.
Both A and B are true.
Neither A and B are true.
